Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.place

Class BankHallObserver

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.place.HallObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.model.place.BankHallObserver
public class BankHallObserver extends HallObserver
This Class is an extension of the HallObserver. In addition to checking professor color, this check the assignment of the coin It uses a Bank to manage coins
